# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow private pages
Disallow: /preferences
Disallow: /my-music
Disallow: /import
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/

# Sitemap (Dynamic - Generated by Laravel backend)
Sitemap: http://localhost:8000/sitemap.xml
# For production, update to: https://yourdomain.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
